name: DATE_DIFF
description: Returns the difference between two dates in the specified unit.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Unit for result (YEAR, MONTH, WEEK, DAY, HOUR, MINUTE, SECOND)

examples.title: Calculate age
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_DIFF(birthdate, CURRENT_DATE, YEAR) as age FROM users

examples.title: Days since event
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_DIFF(event_date, CURRENT_DATE, DAY) as days_ago FROM events

examples.title: Hours between timestamps
examples.sql: SELECT DATE_DIFF(start_time, end_time, HOUR) as duration_hours FROM sessions

notes: Returns negative value if date2 is before date1
